title: Outlook: New options to copy email items in the new Outlook for Windows and web
description: We're thrilled to introduce a new way to copy email items in the new Outlook for web and Windows that will make your email management even more seamless and efficient. Ctrl + Drag and Drop: Simply hold down the Ctrl key while dragging and dropping your email items to effortlessly duplicate them. It's a quick and intuitive way to manage your emails with precision. #newoutlookforwindows
